Event: To start with, Z went to work
Then, he was busy at work
Then, he received a call from his neighbor who saw a\nman broke into his house
Then, he had a fight with the robber
Then, during the fight, Z was punched to death
Then, the robber locked the door and ran away
Then, a friend of Z called him, but never answered
Then, the friend decided to find Z at his house but it\nwas locked

At last, Z was found dead in his house
